## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{7qevdfkr}
ciphertext: 0x5a6be54099d843816afec3792319ae3d1bf10212c3e5e3fa869314bc94ba564526ad6f1fba511e431e858fda57da9db45238bc2972ca8b7eb66fe3dcc1102be7
